Lianfang Dim Sum}} is a shop run by [[Lianfang]]. They sell local [[Food]], [[Cooking Ingredients]], and [[Cooking]] recipes.</p><!--

--><p>The Food stocks refresh on [[World Reset Timers|daily reset]] while the Cooking Ingredient refresh every 3 days. Recipes do not restock.<!--

--><p>The shop lacks the map marker normally present on the other two General Goods shops in Mondstadt and Liyue.</p>}}
